#summary Example queries

= Example Query By Category =

Returns all datasets that are about [http://dbpedia.org/resource/Computer_science Computer Science]. 

{{{
SELECT DISTINCT ?dataset
 WHERE {
   ?dataset a void:Dataset .
   ?dataset dcterms:subject &lt;http://dbpedia.org/resource/Computer_science&gt; .
 }
}}}


= Example Query By Interlinking with certain Dataset =

Returns all datasets that contain links that interlink them with Geonames. 

{{{
SELECT DISTINCT ?dataset
 WHERE {
   ?dataset a void:Dataset .
   ?linkset void:target ?dataset ;
   	    void:target :Geonames .
 }
}}}
